Question: Magna International CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Magna International Inc.

Product: Next Generation eDrive at CES 2024

- Next generation 800V eDrive with improved efficiency, power-to-weight ratio, and torque density
- Incorporates advanced technologies for weight and size reduction, enhanced performance, extended driving range, and sustainability
- Lightweight (75 kg) design with 20% reduction in height
- Ability to rotate the eDrive 90 degrees around the drive axis for improved system integration
- Achieves up to 93% efficiency in real-world driving, offering versatility for primary or complementary secondary drive solution
- Peak power of 250 kW and peak axle torque of 5,000 Nm
- Significant reduction of CO₂ emissions during production by approximately 20% compared to previous generation eDrives
- Can be applied to vehicles in the C, D, and E segments

For more information, visit www.magna.com/CES2024 or visit West Hall booth #3725 in the Las Vegas Convention Center.
Summary_cn:
曼加国际有限公司。

产品：在2024年CES展览会上推出的下一代eDrive

- 下一代800V eDrive提高了效率、功重比和扭矩密度
- 综合了先进技术，以减轻重量和缩小尺寸，提升性能，延长行驶里程并提高可持续性
- 轻量化设计（重量75千克），高度降低20%
- 可以将eDrive沿驱动轴旋转90度，以改善系统集成
- 在实际驾驶中达到高达93%的效率，可作为主驱动或辅助驱动解决方案
- 峰值功率250千瓦，峰值轴扭矩5000牛顿米
- 与上一代eDrive相比，生产过程中二氧化碳排放量显著减少约20%
- 可应用于C、D和E级车型

获取更多信息，请访问网站www.magna.com/CES2024或在拉斯维加斯会议中心西厅的3725号展位参观。
